Package hms.appointment

Class AppointmentRepository

java.lang.Object
hms.common.AbstractRepository<Appointment>
hms.appointment.AppointmentRepository
public class AppointmentRepository extends AbstractRepository<Appointment>
Repository class for managing appointments in the hospital management system.

    • create

      public Appointment create(String patientId, String doctorId, Timeslot timeslot)
      Creates a new Appointment with the specified patient ID, doctor ID, and date.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor
      timeslot - the time slot of the appointment
      Returns:
      the created Appointment

    • updateTimeslot

      public void updateTimeslot(String id, Timeslot timeslot)
      Update the time slot of an appointment to a new date and time
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the appointment whose time slot will be changed
      timeslot - The new time slot which the appointment will be set to

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(String id, AppointmentStatus status)
      Update the status of an appointment
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the appointment whose status will be updated
      status - The new status of the appointment

    • updateRecord

      public void updateRecord(String id, String service, ArrayList<String> prescriptionIds, String notes)
      Updates the medical record of the Appointment with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Appointment
      service - the service provided during the appointment
      prescriptionIds - the list of prescription IDs given during the appointment
      notes - additional notes about the appointment
